tag_list: dror-zaifman, email-marketing, email-marketing-consulting, email-marketing-consultant, search-engine-optimization, seo
overview: Dror has been responsible for all aspects of planning and executing email campaigns that build awareness, drive traffic, and generate revenue across numerous type of products. Dror has served as subject matter expert on email marketing and has a solid knowledge of email strategies and best practices. Furthermore Dror is a metrics driven individual who has a passion for driving better response rates, with an experienced eye towards ROI targets by analyzing large volumes of data that lead to key marketing and business decision in a fast-paced environment.
